description: Wild Thing (Rina Logan) is a fictional character from Marvel Comics, who exists in the MC2 universe, an alternate future to the Marvel Universe. She is the daughter of the X-Men's Wolverine and the rogue mercenary Elektra.  She first appeared in J2 #5 and was created by Tom DeFalco and Ron Lim.An unrelated character named Wild Thing (Nikki Doyle), who fought crime in a future virtual reality world, had her own brief series under the Marvel UK imprint in 1993.
name: Wild Thing
